Uses of Task in peregrine.task
 

Classes in peregrine.task that implement Task
 class BaseMapperTask
          Base task for all task that read input from external systems or the filesystem (or pipes).
 class BaseTask
          Generic code shared across all tasks.
 class MapperTask
          Handles executing map jobs.
 class MergerTask
          Handles invoking merges, reading the data off disk, etc.
 class ReducerTask
          Task and actual code used for running a reduce on shuffled data.
